# [Interview #78: Letter to Thomas Howard, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=78#9)

#### Thomas Howard

Was what you said about us having all the necessary evidence to unmask Asmodean's killer true (as of
*The Fires of Heaven*
)?

#### Robert Jordan

He still maintains that we should be able to "puzzle out" the killer.
